item.title: Im Mad Plz Help Me
item.dc:creator: @armadyl_slayer armadyl slayer
item.description:
@armadyl_slayer wrote:

[quote=“jarrad, post:2, topic:232802”]Obviosly you edited client.java without having a backup file… R.I.P Unless you come across the source coder
Maybe Re D/l the source, and if you haven’t made any major updates can track the error wrong and use the power of CTRL + C + V

Read the Error -.- [QUOTE]resetItems(3214); // THIS MIGHT STOP CLIENT HACKS HMM?
targetSlot = itemType(wearID);[/QUOTE] Look for this in your server file and compare with you Re Downloaded source Or if YOU Coded the source yourself Unlucky. :l[/quote]lol!!! R.I.P. thats true…

Read full topic

item.title: Im Mad Plz Help Me
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:3, topic:232802”][quote author=jo62900 link=topic=307021.msg2455279#msg2455279 date=1222200563]
Okay… Lol im having touble with my server bcuz it keeps saying

client.java:13068: cannot find symbol
symbol : method GetCLAttack(int)
location: class client
int CLAttack = GetCLAttack(wearID);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . . [/quote]

You need to declare the GetCLAttack int as a method.[/quote]

Read full topic

lol i did have a backup but it says the backup is error too so i downloaded another source of java and it still said it and i never even touched my client.java and it randomly just said it my comp is ******* Stupid and retarted

item.title: Im Mad Plz Help Me

item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[quote=“jo62900, post:1, topic:232802”]Okay… Lol im having touble with my server bcuz it keeps saying

client.java:13068: cannot find symbol
symbol : method GetCLAttack(int)
location: class client
int CLAttack = GetCLAttack(wearID);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You need to declare the GetCLAttack int as a method.

item.title: Im Mad Plz Help Me
item.dc:creator: @jarrad jarrad
item.description:
@jarrad wrote:

Obviosly you edited client.java without having a backup file… R.I.P Unless you come across the source coder
Maybe Re D/l the source, and if you haven’t made any major updates can track the error wrong and use the power of CTRL + C + V

Read the Error -.- [QUOTE]resetItems(3214); // THIS MIGHT STOP CLIENT HACKS HMM?
targetSlot = itemType(wearID);[/QUOTE] Look for this in your server file and compare with you Re Downloaded source Or if YOU Coded the source yourself Unlucky. :l

item.title: Im Mad Plz Help Me
item.dc:creator: @jo62900 jo62900
item.description:
@jo62900 wrote:

Okay… Lol im having touble with my server bcuz it keeps saying

client.java:13068: cannot find symbol
symbol : method GetCLAttack(int)
location: class client
int CLAttack = GetCLAttack(wearID);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

On My Compiler and my Clients.Java is written as

resetItems(3214); // THIS MIGHT STOP CLIENT HACKS HMM?
targetSlot = itemType(wearID);

        int CLAttack = GetCLAttack(wearID);
        int CLDefence = GetCLDefence(wearID);
        int CLStrength = GetCLStrength(wearID);
        int CLMagic = GetCLMagic(wearID);
        int CLRanged = GetCLRanged(wearID);
        boolean GoFalse = false;

    if (playerLevel[playerAttack] - CLAttack < 0) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need " + CLAttack + " " + statName[playerAttack]
                    + " to equip this item.");
            GoFalse = true;
        }
        if (playerLevel[playerDefence] - CLDefence < 0) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need " + CLDefence + " " + statName[playerDefence]
                    + " to equip this item.");
            GoFalse = true;
        }
        if (playerLevel[playerStrength] - CLStrength < 0) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need " + CLStrength + " "
                    + statName[playerStrength] + " to equip this item.");
            GoFalse = true;
        }
        if (playerLevel[playerMagic] - CLMagic < 0) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need " + CLMagic + " " + statName[playerMagic]
                    + " to equip this item.");
            GoFalse = true;
        }
        if (playerLevel[playerRanged] - CLRanged < 0) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need " + CLRanged + " " + statName[playerRanged]
                    + " to equip this item.");
            GoFalse = true;
        }
        if (GoFalse == true) {
            return false;
        }
        int wearAmount = playerItemsN[slot];
		
		if (wearAmount < 1) {
			return false;
		}

:mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

Read full topic
